comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Edward Everett McCall, unsuccessful Democratic (Tammany) candidate for Mayor of New York City; beaten in the November election by John Purroy Mitchel, a Fusion candidate. There are ten photos in the Bain/LOC photostream in which McCall appears.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I added him to Wikipedia last time: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Everett_McCall

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan.  He looks like the perfect Tammany candidate, doesn't he?  We'll fill in his name in the caption the next time we update the record.  We're working hard to get corrections made to these records.  Bear with us, and we'll get to as many as we can.
